name: wundergraph-demo
description: This repository demonstrates how to combine multiple APIs into one unified API and exposing it as a secure JSON API without losing on developer experience.

scripts.start: run-p -l start:services generate:api && run-p start:api start:nextjs
scripts.start:gitpod: run-p -l start:services gitpod:generate:api && run-p gitpod:start:api start:nextjs
scripts.generate:api: wait-on http://localhost:4001 http://localhost:4002 http://localhost:4003 http://localhost:4004 && cd api && npm run generate
scripts.start:api: wait-on http://localhost:4001 http://localhost:4002 http://localhost:4003 http://localhost:4004 && cd api && npm run start
scripts.gitpod:generate:api: wait-on http://localhost:4001 http://localhost:4002 http://localhost:4003 http://localhost:4004 && cd api && npm run gitpod:generate
scripts.gitpod:start:api: wait-on http://localhost:4001 http://localhost:4002 http://localhost:4003 http://localhost:4004 && cd api && npm run gitpod:start
